criteria.name: SQL injection identified
criteria.description: Agent identifies SQL injection vulnerabilities in the string-formatted SQL queries (at minimum the INSERT and SELECT statements)

criteria.name: Plaintext password storage flagged
criteria.description: Agent identifies that passwords are stored in plaintext without hashing

criteria.name: Missing authentication on admin endpoint
criteria.description: Agent identifies the /admin/delete endpoint has no authentication or authorization check

criteria.name: Correct output format used
criteria.description: Findings use the specified format with Severity, Confidence (>=8), Description, Exploit Scenario, and Recommendation fields

criteria.name: No false positives reported
criteria.description: Agent does not report theoretical, low-confidence, or noise findings (e.g., no rate limiting warnings, no DoS concerns)
